name: Goop (PurpleParmy)
description:
Goop

You've heard of Jump King, and You've heard of Getting Over It, Introducing the next Fodian game to hit the scene Goop.

In Goop your goal is to simply reach the top and free the developer, oh but he's unfortunately forgotten to implement any checkpoints, oh well don't fall.

Goop the slime has a tele-ball that they can throw and teleport to. Simply use the mouse to aim and power your throw and wait for the ball to hit the ground.

Good Luck!

1st In The World

The first person to tweet @Cactus_Platypus with proof they've beaten the game will get their name put here!

Assets

Most game assets are from Kenney, who's a bit of a legend!
